column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Authorities detained a Chinese suspect after he was involved in a fight which injured two other Chinese nationals
column4: police said.------The incident occurred at 8 pm on  19 May at a casino in front of Wat Pagoda
column7: police arrested a suspect and two victims were sent to the provincial hospital for treatment
column8: and one man with serious injuries* was later sent to a Phnom Penh Hospital.------*Injuries are not specified
column9: but looks like a stab wound to the guts.------Huy Bunleng/ABC
